message.content:
cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI 

This paper deals with designing personalized advertisements while taking into account the privacy concerns of consumers. It uses a Markov decision process (MDP) model to capture different consumer privacy sensitivities and the cost of perceived privacy violations. This falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it involves modeling consumer behavior and decision-making. It also involves optimization (cs.LG) and system design (cs.CY) in terms of designing the optimal coupon-offering strategy for the retailer. Additionally, it deals with uncertainty (cs.SI) in terms of imperfect cost feedback and uncertain initial belief state.
